thread.title: See what you missed at Orlando theme parks this summer
thread.title_full: See what you missed at Orlando theme parks this summer

author: Dewayne Bevil
title: See what you missed at Orlando theme parks this summer
text:
themeparks ICYMI: Scareactor dining coming to #hhn25 http://t.co/JKFV1zoOPq Disney debuts Polynesian's newest offerings 
Disney World has started showing off some of the changes it has made to Disney's Polynesian Village Resort, one of its original on-property hotels. 
Disney World has started showing off some of the changes it has made to Disney's Polynesian Village Resort, one of its original on-property hotels. What's been hot this summer at Orlando's theme parks 
Ah, September. School is back in session, and the bulk of tourists has gone home. There's definitely increased elbow room in the theme parks at this time of year, and if we really, really concentrate, we can pretend like the outdoor temps have dropped a smidge. 
In addition, the blackout dates for some types of annual passholders have passed in all of Central Florida's parks. 
So if you've been avoiding the attractions, now is the time to jump back in. Here are some highlights that you've missed — but can still see in September — from the past few months. Caption Orlando's newest rides and attractions Caption Fast & Furious: Supercharged Universal Orlando 
The attraction based on the Fast & Furious movie franchise will be opening in 2017. To make way for the ride, Universal will be closing Disaster! and Beetlejuice Graveyard Revue. 
The attraction based on the Fast & Furious movie franchise will be opening in 2017. To make way for the ride, Universal will be closing Disaster! and Beetlejuice Graveyard Revue. (Universal Orlando) See more galleries 
•In the early days, Universal touted a "real, live dinosaur." Its case is even more convincing with the opening of Raptor Encounter at Islands of Adventure. It's basically a Jurassic Park meet-and-greet with photo op, but a fascinating one that's made entertaining by the personalities of the very-old-school creatures.
